title: Anna, The Pleasure, The Torment, Anna Quel Particolare Piacere 1973

sources.title: Anna The Pleasure The Torment Anna Quel Particolare Piacere
sources.description: A beautiful but poor young girl finds all the money and material goods she never had when she becomes the girlfriend of a crime boss, but soon learns that there is a price to be paid for that kind of life. An Italian Giallo film mostly posting for Edwige Fenech. Carla Mancini has a bit part, one of her 241 credits listed at IMDb. English with optional English and Russian subtitles
